article_title: Ceasefire only way to end 'violence, hatred, misery' - UN refugee chief.
sentence: The  head  of  the  refugee  agency  Filippo  Grandi  insists  a  ceasefire  in  Gaza  and  Lebanon  "is  the  only  way  to  break  the  cycle  of  violence,  of  hatred,  and  of  misery"  Speaking  at  a  UNHCR  meeting  in  Geneva,  he  says  only  a  ceasefire  could  "stem  the  tide  to  a  major  regional  war  with  global  implications"  He  also  says  226  staff  working  for  the  UN  agency  for  Palestinian  refugees,  Unwra,  were  killed  in  Gaza  in  the  past  year.
